body: I had 38 monuments yesterday on the leaderboard and now I have 25?
body_tagged: I had 38 monuments yesterday on the leaderboard and now I have 25?
title: Leaderboard?

replies.body: You were probably looking at the weekly stats for DTM. The other 13 monuments must have been destroyed 7 days prior to you checking it (now 8 days, hence your weekly total going down to 25).
replies.body_tagged: You were probably looking at the weekly stats for DTM. The other 13 monuments must have been destroyed 7 days prior to you checking it (now 8 days, hence your weekly total going down to 25).

replies.body: Thank you for that. Feel free to lock this now I have found my answer.
replies.body_tagged: Thank you for that. Feel free to lock this now I have found my answer.
